long_description: Handy on business trips, vacations and camping trips, the REI Nightlight Travel Clock is easy to pack and easy to read at night. LED-illuminated display provides simple nighttime viewing and use as a nightlight; push-button boost offers flashlight capability. Large digital display is easy to read. Four-minute snooze-button feature. The REI Nightlight Travel Clock runs on three AAA batteries, included.
short_description: Handy on business trips, vacations and camping trips, the REI Nightlight Travel Clock is easy to pack and easy to read at night.
